name: Bury 50 Dragon Bones
description: Bury 50 Dragon Bones at any location.

name: Catch 25 Monkfish
description: Catch 25 raw monkfish (requires Swan Song quest).

name: Complete a Slayer Task from Nieve/Steve
description: Get and complete any slayer task from Nieve or Steve.

name: Smith an Adamant Platebody
description: Smith an adamant platebody from scratch.

name: Craft 100 Law Runes
description: Craft 100 law runes via the Abyss.

name: Defeat the Giant Mole
description: Kill the Giant Mole in the Falador Mole Lair.

name: Steal from a Knight of Ardougne
description: Successfully pickpocket a Knight of Ardougne.

name: Complete a Hard Clue Scroll
description: Complete all steps of a hard tier clue scroll.

name: Enter the Myths' Guild
description: Enter the Myths' Guild (requires Dragon Slayer II).

name: Mine 25 Adamantite Ore
description: Mine 25 adamantite ore.

name: Burn 100 Yew Logs
description: Burn 100 yew logs.

name: Defeat a Black Demon
description: Kill one Black Demon.

name: Obtain 50 Golden Nuggets
description: Earn 50 golden nuggets from the Motherlode Mine.

name: Fletch a Magic Longbow
description: Fletch and string a magic longbow.

name: Create a Super Attack Potion (4)
description: Create a 4-dose super attack potion.

name: Fish a Leaping Sturgeon
description: Catch a leaping sturgeon using a barbarian rod.

name: Complete a Temple Trek
description: Successfully guide a follower through the Burgh de Rott Ramble.

name: Defeat a Fossil Island Wyvern
description: Kill any type of Wyvern on Fossil Island.

name: Smith a Rune Scimitar
description: Smith a rune scimitar from a runite bar.

name: Charge an Amulet of Glory
description: Charge an Amulet of Glory at the Fountain of Rune.

name: Obtain Full Angler's Outfit
description: Collect all four pieces of the Angler's outfit from Fishing Trawler.

name: Defeat Vorkath
description: Kill the Dragon Slayer II boss, Vorkath.

name: Equip a Trident of the Seas
description: Obtain and equip a Trident of the Seas.

name: Complete a full God Wars Dungeon kill
description: Kill any of the four main God Wars Dungeon bosses.

name: Obtain an Imbued God Cape
description: Complete Mage Arena II and imbue any god cape.

name: Defeat Zulrah
description: Kill the solo snake boss, Zulrah.

name: Obtain a Dragon Harpoon
description: Receive a Dragon Harpoon as a drop from Wyrms.

name: Complete an Elite Clue Scroll
description: Complete all steps of an elite tier clue scroll.

name: Equip an Avernic Defender
description: Obtain an avernic defender hilt from the Theatre of Blood and combine it.

name: Defeat The Gauntlet
description: Successfully complete a run of The Gauntlet in Prifddinas.

name: Obtain a piece of Barrows Equipment
description: Receive any piece of Barrows armour or a weapon from the chest.

name: Defeat a Demonic Gorilla
description: Kill a Demonic Gorilla and receive a Zenyte shard.

name: Obtain a Dragon Warhammer
description: Receive a Dragon Warhammer as a drop from Lizardman Shamans.

name: Receive any Boss Pet
description: Obtain a pet from any boss in the game.

name: Complete the Corrupted Gauntlet
description: Successfully complete a run of the Corrupted Gauntlet.

name: Obtain a Spectral Sigil
description: Receive a Spectral Sigil as a drop from the Corporeal Beast.

name: Obtain a piece of Ancestral
description: Receive any piece of the Ancestral robes set from the Chambers of Xeric.

name: Complete a no-food Fight Caves run
description: Obtain a Fire Cape without consuming any food.
